divs: Sighting DetailsIt was very clear, starry and about 20 degrees last night. As I was drivingwestbound on Rt. 28 in Kingston, I noticed a 3-light triangular formation thatappeared to have been either 3 separate aircraft or one with 3 lights. Thelatter would be more likely since they moved in total unison very slowly andsmoothly. It seemed to be very low at treetop level because as I went up anddown the hills, I lost sight of it. Although it was a very clear night, I couldnot see the body of the object(s) over or behind the lights. It moved in astraight eastbound direction. I thought about ultralights, but it was too coldfor that.
Summary: Saw a triangular formation of 3 lights
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Kingston
There were no other sightings in Kingston on or around April 6th 2002
